"Working with rare materials":
"Big news! They say that a previously never-before
seen enemy has appeared at the deep recesses
of the ruins! Also, there is also the rumour
that they have in possession, a very-very rare material!
With that, there is no reason for not getting a
hold of it yeah! With that, won't you go and
get it for me?
*Knight Gear drops Drop during
destruction of the sword and the shield"

"大ニュースだよ！　遺跡の奥で見たことない
エネミーが出現したんだって！
しかもしかも、すごーく珍しい素材を
持ってるってウワサだよ！

これはもう、手に入れない理由はないよね！
ってわけで、取ってきてくれないかな？

※ナイトギアがドロップ
　剣と盾は部位破壊時にドロップ"
